title: Everyday English Course 120
description: Improve your English comprehension skills through short everyday conversations and situational dialogues.

sections.title: Section 1: English Practice
sections.description: Learn to understand and respond to basic English dialogues used in daily situations.

questionTemplates.text_en:
M: Excuse me. I'm a photographer. May I take a picture of you and your little boy?
W: What's it for?
M: It's for a book of pictures. I call it Family Album. U.S.A..
W: Oh, that's a nice idea. Well, it's fine if you take our picture.
M: Thank you. I really appreciate your help.
{a}
